comments.text:

Build Identifier: 1.0b1

In iCal, there is the possibility to add a caldav account with a link like that(root): 
http://cal.com/caldav.php/dany.bouchard/
And it would be very useful to use permissions and see who shares its calendar(s).
Adding every calendars to Sunbird individually can be long to do. With permissions, if i add the Patrick's calendars to my iCal, if he decides to create and share to me a new one, i'll see it appears on my iCal.

Reproducible: Always




Thank you for reading.
